Oct. 6, 2012 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Adam Smith Theatre, Kirkcaldy, Fife, Scotland, UK Best 1st section: Unison Kinneil Best 2nd section: Tullis Russell Mills Best 3rd section: Renfrew Burgh Best 4th section: Kingdom Brass B
Best march: Kirkintilloch Kelvin Brass Best hymn: Kingdom Brass
Best cornet: Soprano (Kirkintilloch Kelvin) Best flugel horn or tenor horn: Tenor Horn (Kingdom Brass) Best euphonium or baritone: Euphonium (Bon Accord) Best trombone: Johnstone Silver Best bass section: Unison Kinneil Best percussion: Kingdom Brass
Winning Conductor - Craig Anderson
Best Fife 'A' Band - Kingdom Brass 'A' Best Fife 'B' Band - Kingdom Brass 'B'
Oct. 7, 2012, 9:49 a.m. Oct. 1, 2013, 1:18 p.m.
